lines.text: [discussing how to split the money]
I want half.
Half. Fuck you, this isn't divorce.
Haven't you ever seen "What's Love Got To Do With It"?
Who fled?
[as Rico explains the Chinese death procedure]
You're Chinese?
I'm Cuban. But I have an affinity for all cultures. Part of my mongrel upbringing on the streets of New York.
New York. That explains the hostility.
Dodge!
Gibson!
It's a setup!
Move!
That's nice, Robin Hood, but we gotta fled!
We gotta get into a rhythm.
What the fuck you know about rhythm?
I'm a foster child, raised by the state.
What's your point?

There was this caretaker who was like a father to me. His name was Titus. He taught me that everybody lives their life according to a rhythm. You make love to a rhythm. Your heart beats to a rhythm. If we're gonna run together, we gotta get into the same rhythm.
I got your rhythm, convict.
[Pulls out and plays harmonica]
Come on, Dodge! We gotta fled.
